description: Two men in hats and glasses stand in a field of tall grass and flowers. One man holds a large butterfly net, and both are sweating with expressions of intense focus. They are attempting to capture a black and white spectral entity resembling a ghost with large eyes, which is emerging from the grass. This presents a surreal scenario where physical means are used to pursue a non-physical being.
caption: “Eaaaaaasy, Smithers! ... Eaaaaasy ... Oh please, oh please!”
